title: Pokemon Movie 21: Minna no Monogatari
alternative_title: Pokémon the Movie: The Power of Us, 劇場版ポケットモンスター みんなの物語
description: Ash and Pikachu embark on a new journey to Fula City where the yearly Wind Festival takes place. There they meet new trainers and friends in order to later help save the city along with the mythical pokemon Zeraora.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Game>, <Genre -> Kids>]
